query:
INSERT INTO packages (name, slug, destination, category, description, duration_days, price_usd, image_url, highlights, included_services, best_season, difficulty_level, group_size, published, created_at, updated_at) VALUES
('Luxury Island Escape', 'luxury-island-escape', 'Maafushi', 'luxury', 'Experience ultimate luxury with overwater bungalows and world-class amenities', 5, 2500, '/images/luxury-package.jpg', JSON_ARRAY('5-star resort', 'Spa treatments', 'Gourmet dining'), JSON_ARRAY('Accommodation', 'Meals', 'Transfers'), 'November-April', 'easy', 4, 1, NOW(), NOW()),
('Diving Adventure', 'diving-adventure', 'Gulhi', 'adventure', 'Explore vibrant coral reefs and encounter exotic marine life', 4, 1800, '/images/diving-package.jpg', JSON_ARRAY('Guided dives', 'PADI certification', 'Snorkeling'), JSON_ARRAY('Diving equipment', 'Boat transfers', 'Meals'), 'October-May', 'intermediate', 6, 1, NOW(), NOW()),
('Island Hopping Tour', 'island-hopping-tour', 'Multiple Islands', 'exploration', 'Visit multiple islands and experience diverse cultures and landscapes', 6, 1500, '/images/island-hopping.jpg', JSON_ARRAY('4 island visits', 'Local guides', 'Beach activities'), JSON_ARRAY('Transfers', 'Accommodation', 'Meals'), 'Year-round', 'easy', 8, 1, NOW(), NOW()),
('Romantic Honeymoon Package', 'romantic-honeymoon', 'Dhigurah', 'romance', 'Perfect getaway for newlyweds with private beach and sunset dinners', 7, 3500, '/images/honeymoon-package.jpg', JSON_ARRAY('Private villa', 'Sunset cruise', 'Couples spa'), JSON_ARRAY('Luxury accommodation', 'All meals', 'Activities'), 'November-March', 'easy', 2, 1, NOW(), NOW()),
('Budget Backpacker', 'budget-backpacker', 'Huraa', 'budget', 'Affordable island adventure with shared accommodations and local experiences', 3, 600, '/images/backpacker-package.jpg', JSON_ARRAY('Guesthouse stay', 'Local food', 'Beach time'), JSON_ARRAY('Basic accommodation', 'Breakfast', 'Ferry transfers'), 'Year-round', 'easy', 10, 1, NOW(), NOW()),
('Surfing Paradise', 'surfing-paradise', 'Thulusdhoo', 'adventure', 'Ride the waves at some of the best surf breaks in the Indian Ocean', 5, 1200, '/images/surfing-package.jpg', JSON_ARRAY('Surfing lessons', 'Board rental', 'Beginner-friendly'), JSON_ARRAY('Accommodation', 'Meals', 'Equipment'), 'March-October', 'intermediate', 5, 1, NOW(), NOW()),
('Wellness Retreat', 'wellness-retreat', 'Himmafushi', 'wellness', 'Rejuvenate with yoga, meditation, and holistic wellness treatments', 6, 2000, '/images/wellness-package.jpg', JSON_ARRAY('Daily yoga', 'Meditation', 'Spa treatments'), JSON_ARRAY('Yoga classes', 'Healthy meals', 'Accommodation'), 'Year-round', 'easy', 4, 1, NOW(), NOW()),
('Photography Expedition', 'photography-expedition', 'Kaashidhoo', 'exploration', 'Capture stunning landscapes and wildlife with professional photography guides', 4, 1600, '/images/photography-package.jpg', JSON_ARRAY('Professional guides', 'Sunrise shoots', 'Editing workshop'), JSON_ARRAY('Accommodation', 'Meals', 'Guide services'), 'November-April', 'intermediate', 6, 1, NOW(), NOW()),
('Family Fun Package', 'family-fun-package', 'Maafushi', 'family', 'Create lasting memories with activities suitable for all ages', 5, 1400, '/images/family-package.jpg', JSON_ARRAY('Water sports', 'Snorkeling', 'Beach games'), JSON_ARRAY('Family villa', 'All meals', 'Activities'), 'December-January', 'easy', 6, 1, NOW(), NOW()),
('Eco-Tourism Adventure', 'eco-tourism-adventure', 'Gulhi', 'sustainability', 'Sustainable travel experience with focus on marine conservation', 4, 1300, '/images/eco-package.jpg', JSON_ARRAY('Conservation work', 'Nature walks', 'Local community'), JSON_ARRAY('Eco-lodge', 'Organic meals', 'Activities'), 'Year-round', 'easy', 5, 1, NOW(), NOW());
